alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 2:30PM CST until January 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations between a glaze and one tenth of an inch. Areas south of Interstate 44 could locally reach two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Kansas and central, southwest, and west central Missouri. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
